findings.title: Root account MFA not enforced
findings.description: The AWS root account is not protected with MFA, increasing the likelihood of full account compromise.

recommended_actions.title: Enable MFA for root and lock down root usage
recommended_actions.description: Enable MFA, store break-glass procedure, and restrict root usage to emergency-only.

findings.title: CloudTrail log integrity and retention not standardized
findings.description: CloudTrail exists but retention and log file validation are inconsistent across regions and accounts.

recommended_actions.title: Standardize CloudTrail retention and enable log file validation
recommended_actions.description: Set retention to 365 days, enable integrity validation, and centralize logs to a dedicated account/bucket.

findings.title: Dev VPC lacks environment segmentation
findings.description: Development network boundaries are weak; east-west traffic is broadly permitted and security groups are permissive.

recommended_actions.title: Introduce subnet tiering and tighten security group baselines
recommended_actions.description: Create segmented subnets, restrict east-west flows, and apply least-privilege security group templates.

findings.title: Centralized log onboarding is partial
findings.description: Not all critical Azure resources send diagnostics to Log Analytics; visibility gaps exist for identity and network events.

recommended_actions.title: Onboard diagnostics for critical resources to Log Analytics
recommended_actions.description: Enable diagnostics for identity, network, and key services; define retention and alerting baselines.

findings.title: KMS key rotation disabled for production keys
findings.description: Key rotation is not enabled, increasing exposure window if a key is compromised.

recommended_actions.title: Enable automated KMS rotation and document key management standards
recommended_actions.description: Enable rotation, define key ownership, and set a standard for rotation intervals and exceptions.

findings.title: Cloud asset inventory is fragmented across teams
findings.description: Asset ownership and tagging are inconsistent, making it harder to scope incidents and enforce policies.

recommended_actions.title: Define a minimum tagging standard and ownership model
recommended_actions.description: Enforce required tags (owner, data_class, env), and publish an ownership and exception process.
